Translations.Text: Lemmer i sen Nuri: "mmin$et"! Ne$ "ff$et seg ixxamen nnwen"! Ur p xeddmen, siwa kra segsen. Ppif, i nitni, lemmer xdimen ayen u$uo pwanecden. D atebbet uuwib
Imiren ad asen Nefk, s$uoneÂ£, arraz ameqwoaean
A ten Nenhu s abrid uwqim
Wid ippa$en awal i Oebbi akked Umazan, widak atnan ar wid I$at Oebbi ger lambiyya, wid issdaqen, ccuhada, uualein. Ay telha tdukli d wigi
Wagi d lfevl s$uo Oebbi. Nesteqnaa s Oebbi d Amusnaw
A wid iumnen! Eadret iman nnwen! eeedmet d igrawen, ne$ eeedmet akw
Ih, garawen win ipaaiiilen. Ma tu$em tiyta, ad yini: "I$at iyi Oebbi, ur lli$ yidsen, d anagi
Ma iusa kwen id lfevl s$uo Oebbi, ad yini, war ccekk, amzun ur telli tegmap garawen: "a lemmer lli$ yidsen, ad rebee$ rrbee ameqwoaean
Ad nna$en deg ubrid n Oebbi wid izznuzun tameddurt n ddunit i laxert. Win ipna$en deg ubrid n Oebbi, immut ne$ irbee, ad as Nefk arraz ameqwoaean
